Desc.entry: Aims to establish a support and self-help group for people who have had mental health difficulties and are looking to return to employment, voluntary work or training. People who have had experience of the mental health system themselves and want to pass on their knowledge will lead the group. Organises training opportunities and encourages service users to use their skills to support others. Represents a unique opportunity to be involved in a scheme where skills, experience and knowledge are the most important attributes.
